item.title: House Republicans advance Trump's tax cut plan
item.description: The Republican-controlled U.S. House of Representatives late on Tuesday advanced President Donald Trump's tax-cut and border security agenda.

item.title: Trump administration, DOGE hit roadblocks in three court cases
item.description: One judge called the Trump administration's funding freeze "ill-conceived from the beginning."
